critique: This document pertains to civil service rules and promotions within the Custodial Service and the Division of Equipment and Supplies under the Fourth Assistant Postmaster General. It allows for the promotion of unclassified laborers to classified positions through non-competitive examination, subject to Civil Service Commission approval. The order aims to provide advancement opportunities for unskilled personnel while maintaining certain limitations on their classified status and transferability. There is no clear indication of ideological tilt, immigration stance, executive power expansion, federalism implications, national security concerns, economic regulation, or social inclusion aspects. Therefore, the initial scores are set to 0 across all axes.
